metadata.title: CVE-2019-13640 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In qBittorrent before 4.1.7, the function Application::runExternalProgram()located in app/application.cpp allows command injection via shellmetacharacters in the torrent name parameter or current tracker parameter,as demonstrated by remote command execution via a crafted name within anRSS feed.

criterions.comment: qbittorrent package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
